qas.question: What does the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Greece conduct?
The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Turkey does not use what term?
The Middle East, the Balkans and others are included in what republic?

context: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Greece conducts <a0_0>"bilateral relationships"<a0_0/> with the countries of the "Mediterranean – Middle East Region" but has formulated no Near East Region. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the <a2_0>Republic of Turkey<a2_0/> also does not use the term <a1_0>Near East<a1_0/>. Its regions include the Middle East, the Balkans and others.
